website_summaries.verdict: Those seeking an all-inclusive pool ball set will be thrilled by this 32-piece accessory kit.
pros: Pool balls are made regulation size and are fade, chip, and crack-resistant
Includes a repair kit, four pool sticks, cue racks, and many more accessories
cons: The included cue sticks could be higher quality
Sticks are a little too lightweight as well

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well, the balls work. Actually most of the kit isn’t too bad but I really wasn’t expecting all of the sticks to have issues. All 4 sticks are various degrees of bent and I’ve had to glue tips back on after the first hit. One stick even has a knot near the top that causes it to bend in several directions.
customer_reviews.author: Active Dad

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The reason for four stars and not five, the racks! Both racks were flawed and would not form a tight rack at all! The product(s) arrived on time, as described by Amazon & manufacturer, it was shipped without issue, arrived within prescribed estimates, the packaging was undamaged, and the product itself was unmolested and made with quality materials. Description, photograph, website presentation, and what arrived are the same-size, shape, color, and it matched my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: 007Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Balls comes with the package have bad quality. Not worth to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Almost all balls cracked after one year light use. Give 3 star because cues are good. I played abt 20 times over last year. Total play time less than 20 hour and almost all balls are cracked and some of them are in bad conditions. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The Quality Seems Good
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I was astounded at how quickly the product shipped. Having recently decided to open my game room back up :-) after all, it's the barbecue season, I decided to order a new set of tools for my guests. Within 1 day or two, the product had arrived. I bent down to pick it up...thinking it was something I'd ordered for my car, when to my amazement, it was this kit. I became so excited that I challenged my son to a quick game. Before I knew it, the entire neighborhood was over enjoying my pool table. There we no complaints about the quality of the kit...and once again, I'm the "belle" of the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Distinguished Toastmaster

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough for us!
customer_reviews.text: The Five Stars are for the price, the items are about 4.5 stars. Everything works, the sticks are relatively straight, and nothing was broken. I can't ask for more out of an inexpensive "kid friendly" complete set of pool supplies. The brushes for the table are fairly useless, I will probably invest in better quality horse hair bristle brushes soon.. these plastic bristles are being let all over the table.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T.

customer_reviews.title: A good starter set
customer_reviews.text: some of the cues came warped/slightly bent. The tip shaper wore out quickly. The balls are nice and the white is a bright clean white. The box had no indication of top or bottom and the way you think would make the most sense to open it may be upside down, so open cautiously.
customer_reviews.author: KrisKrisKris

customer_reviews.title: cues are warped
customer_reviews.text: Sent the 1st set back the sticks where so warped. 2nd set was better but still not great. The cover is supper thin and ripped right away. I gave 3 stars because you get what you pay for. I have a table in my basement and it's just for fun so I don't need the best.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and a really good value if you just bought a pool table and need the whole kit. The box did come a little damaged but everything inside was in good shape. Poles seemed a little flimsy but we haven’t had a problem yet! Great kit for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Do not suggest !
customer_reviews.text: Pool sticks look cheap, one pool stick cracked and pivets. Amazon only gave me $16.36 credit and still had to pay out of pocket. Next times I'll spend the little extra else where.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice straight cues.
customer_reviews.text: It's a complete package with some extra features .Cues are very well polished and when connect the top to handle it pretty straight and stiff .Very well packaged and in my opinion price was ideal.
customer_reviews.author: John Khamis Hesar

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in the mail today, it was supposed to be a gift for my boyfriend that i purchased on cyber Monday because that was the only time i could afford to get it, and EVERY SINGLE STICK is cracked. I'm sorely dissapointed and heart broken because this was supposed to be his Christmas gift and now I'm screwed cyber Monday is over. I don't recommend this product very poorly made!! EVERY POOL STICK WAS CRACKED AND SPLIT.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hall

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible set. Brush started falling apart the first time I used it. Ended up with bristles all over the felt. Bridge doesn’t fit on end of stick. Cue sticks don’t match... are random colors. Cover is super cheap. Just junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the order
customer_reviews.text: everything was as described and good quality except the bridge stick. the bridge has threads and the stick would not fit in the bridge. It is as though it needs a tip on it to screw into the bridge.
customer_reviews.author: paula d walker

customer_reviews.title: The cues aren't the best, but the rest is good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same issues as others with the fairly crappy cues that came in this kit, which is why I removed one star. Failing that one issue, everything else is good quality and works very well. The balls roll cleanly, the brushes are just soft enough to clean the felt without tearing. You can't really go wrong with this kit provided you don't need cue sticks.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Amazon to the rescue.
customer_reviews.text: The pool table was a new addition to the Barbershop. Without accessories. The package I get from you guys was all I needed to make it complete.
customer_reviews.author: Amun Sobek Ra El

customer_reviews.title: Chipped Balls! 👎
customer_reviews.text: Very upset that the balls are chipping after 2-3 uses. Wish there was a way to just have them replaced but keep the rest of the stuff, although two of the pool sticks are warped as well. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: family

customer_reviews.title: Second Time's a Charm
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got had issues. Some warped cues and one that was just messed up--wouldn't thread on properly. So I asked for an exchange. Amazon sent the new one right away and let me return the prior at my leisure (by a generous date). The new one is great--better quality cues than the first. Not sure why. Anyways, very happy with the value. I know the cues aren't great--I have my own $200 cue, but these are pretty good given that you get all this stuff for $100 total. I'd recommend it as a good starter kit, especially for casual shooters/friends and fam. Now if my table were just better... :)
customer_reviews.author: Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the pool cues were severely warped. Appeared to be a return as the two severely warped cues had already been scuffed. Also was missing the 2-piece cue holders. I gave this as a Christmas gift and was embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: 74tiger

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cheap set. None of the sticks or balls were warped. The cover is a little cheap and doesn't have elastic to cold in on the table, but there are little lead weights at the corner to hold it on the table. It could withstand the wind of a house fan without blowing off. Very please with the product. And the sticks are two pieces, and have the slippery finished removed at the top so that you don't actually need hand chalk to play. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice collection of items
customer_reviews.text: Tips fell off two of the pool cues within first 2 hours of playing. Very nice collection of items, but quality of pool cues is poor.
customer_reviews.author: John Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and decent quality
customer_reviews.text: A lot of gear for the money , excellent value , everything you need for your pool table
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Love this it was the perfect addition to my dad's Man Cave/Game room perfect price for the product would order again
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great set and priced well for amount of items.
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. I bought this for my brother as he bought an antic pool table and did not have the essentials for the pool table. This seems to cover it all but I don't know what the brown plastic container and dice are for? If I am that interested I will research. Anyway, my brother loves it and it is fine for a non professional. All items were in package as advertised and arrived timely with my prime membership.
customer_reviews.author: MsKhakiM

customer_reviews.title: Over all it was ok for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: When our package arrived, it looked like our 4 ball had been used and we had 2 sticks bent badly. We weren't looking for professional grade, but we were definitely surprised at how bent the 2 sticks were. I also wish there would have been some type of instructions for the re-tipping kit. The packaging when it arrived was completely destroyed. Our UPS guy almost didn't deliver it because of how badly the packaging was.
customer_reviews.author: bluerose683

customer_reviews.title: Very nice everything i need and more already did a repair ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice everything i need and more already did a repair on an old stick the wall rack is what ihad already that is not included in this kit but it does come withone
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quailty
customer_reviews.text: More than what I expected. Nice quality for the price. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Paula Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for The Price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality for the price. All of the cues are straight and playable. The racks are good. The bridge is just what I needed. Have not played with the balls as I have a nice set. The brushes and the rest of the items were a little cheap, but for the price outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: SC Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly better than decent, with a but...
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at how complete the set is ( replacement tips, tip file, chalk holders, etc) and everything seems to be of rather good quality. My only issue is that one of the cue's sections is missing the brass screw part that would attach the two halves. It's not broken ( the wood is shaped to accept it) it's just not there! I don't want to return the whole set so ill be contacting the manufacturer to see what they say.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ragan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE FOR QUALITY PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality made items. Huge value! Would buy this product from this seller (Trademark Gameroom) again. I was really surprised at the quality of all the items for the price paid. I am very happy with my purchase. The cue sticks are all straight... heavy-duty and not lightweight cheap things; and the cue balls are well-made and heavy-duty also.
customer_reviews.author: LunaSea

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Exceeded expectations! Very nice quality! I feel i got a great product for the price i payed & was a wonderful gift to my loved one. Would definitely recommend & repurchase product.
customer_reviews.author: Tylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Shipment comes like the picture. All pieces were included and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tierra J.

customer_reviews.title: Solid starter set (mixed quality)
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter billiards kit. It has everything one needs out of the box for a decent price. However, the quality is mixed. Billiard balls -- good quality Pool cues -- unlike other reviews, I thought the cues were good. They are not great, but they work well for average play. Bridge -- kind of cheap Cover -- works great Brushes -- below average Triangle -- looks cheap and too big
customer_reviews.author: sdbank

customer_reviews.title: Pool accessories
customer_reviews.text: 2 of 4 cues sticks warped. The rest of the kit is fine.
customer_reviews.author: skyler

customer_reviews.title: Get it while it's still at this price
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a good starter kit and took a chance on this one. BOOM, it's awesome for the price. I was truly shocked at the quality of everything in the kit and how many different things were in it. Remember, you're not ordering Minnesota Fats cues here but you are getting straight sticks and solid balls with a ton of extras for a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: The58thMIND

customer_reviews.title: I get by just fine with everything in this set
customer_reviews.text: I had already spent a lot of money on rebuilding a pool table and needed something cheap to get started. I was skeptical when my wife ordered this for me. I am pleasantly surprised. It exceeded my expectations and has everything you need for someone that got their first pool table and is a casual player. Now I can upgrade at my own pace... and I see no hurry. I get by just fine with everything in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Morsett

customer_reviews.title: ... are for but the cue sticks and balls are great quality, along with the wall mount and ball ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have any idea what half of the accessories are for but the cue sticks and balls are great quality, along with the wall mount and ball racks.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Get something better if you want to enjoy your game
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality.. Balls are too solid for the sticks. They would break any minute now. Get something better if you want to enjoy your game. I will sell you mine for half the price advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Eseovhe Egborge

customer_reviews.title: Pool sticks are not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a complete set, but the quality of the pool sticks is not good. Within a month the tips are breaking off. Returned, got new sticks and the same thing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Great basic billiard set
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. The billiard ball set is nice. The cue stick are ok quality. It's weighs lighter compare to my other cue stick. Some of the sticks are not completely straight, it's slanted a little. It seems like the heat affects the wood so it bends. You can still play with it though. But I would prefer something heavier. I love that it comes with a cover and brushes, it helps to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Camille

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, and more. The sticks are far from professional quality, and the American flag stick that came in the set is a little out dated in style, but for under $100, it was exactly what I expected, and for a starter set, or a recreational set, it'll serve its purpose just fine. The billiard balls are excellent and the brushes and racks are convenient. The wall rack is a bit poor, but again, for the money it fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome starter kit! The balls are nice and the sticks are definitely worth the cost of the kit alone!
customer_reviews.author: White17509

customer_reviews.title: Two 7 balls and no 15 ball..
customer_reviews.text: All other items in the kit were fine. Can't beat the price for what you get. Just wish it had a 15 ball
customer_reviews.author: June Melbye

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Get starter set for my new pool table. Gave me everything I need to get started. The cues are straight and the balls are good quality. Would recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AE1985

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for the hubby. He loves it! It comes with everything you need!
customer_reviews.author: Denise B.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for price
customer_reviews.text: Havent tried them yet but figured it wasnt a bad price to atleast break the new table in
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This package came with so many things included and all of the items were good quality
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Good stater kit
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting a billiards area going, and not too expensive to let the kids use them. Paint scrapes off the cues, had to re-glue a few tips on. But good enough for some family fun!
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality for the price. My husband plays in a pool league and was also impressed with the cue stick quality for the price. We were missing the rack, but called customer service and they solved the problem quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Y. DELGADO

customer_reviews.title: Worst product Amazon ever shipped me
customer_reviews.text: Worst product Amazon ever shipped me .. was going to send back but my kids messed up some of the accessories... 2 warped sticks.. all sticks have no wax or polisjbon the cues .. racks suck.. balls are the worst.. coloring is way off
customer_reviews.author: Dontheman

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and great price ... needed new pool balls and queues and brushes and it came all together in this set for less then other sell it for online ... it's an awesome value
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Christina StaynTru

customer_reviews.title: Would be completely happy if we could get rubber replacement end for cue stick..
customer_reviews.text: The rubber end of one of our sticks fell off just s couple days after we got it. We can't find it. I would pay for it if I could get replacement. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: james wayne leroney

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and good price. Will do business again
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected. Fast delivery and good price. Will do business again.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Roman

customer_reviews.title: has a lot the sticks arent that great but everything else works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: has a lot the sticks arent that great but everything else works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jarir DBA

customer_reviews.title: too light weight
customer_reviews.text: All the sticks are too light weight about 17oz,they are Ok if you like that weight i feel if they selling 4 sticks they should be from 17 to 21 oz,the best thing about this set is the racks and the balls, my advise is to get balls and pick out your own sticks, the brisles fall out of the brushes, and the cover is cheep, the rack is Ok.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Sweet deal!
customer_reviews.text: The sticks are really good looking! We bought a house that had a pool table with it but no accessories and this came with everything we needed plus more! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he has been very pleased with all the products. The kit was fairly inexpensive for the quality we received. A great starter kit for our new game room.
customer_reviews.author: D Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: For the money I could not be happier. Everything needed for a new table setup is ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money I could not be happier. Everything needed for a new table setup is included. Value Value Value
customer_reviews.author: SL Guest

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pieces. Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the game room. Has been used several times and no wear noticed yet. Sturdy pieces. Great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little set for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little set for the money. We were given a pool table and this kit had everything we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pixy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for starting up your new table
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I bought this set! Perfect for starting up your new table. One thing I didn't know would be so important is the triangles.. The ones in this package work better than any others.
customer_reviews.author: Alice ThompsonTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and Awesome
customer_reviews.text: the delivery came in . no damage it was strong box . impossible to break it .LOL. they have everything u need for pool things. this is great deal buying otherwise u spending over 200 bucks somewhere. this deal is the best and save u alot bucks.. they have glue tip clamps . works awesome .. everything is so good. thank you amazon for great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Lesniewski

customer_reviews.title: Budget 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I give it 5 stars for what it is. These aren't high quality cues, etc., but everything came as described. If you're looking for budget friendly, entry level equipment, then this is a good option. Purchsed it for a church youth room and didn't want to spend the money on quality equipment that may or may not be treated with care.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joseph R Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: And sometimes your Amazon purchase is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to a children's outreach center . they're pool table had just been repaired. We were really impressed in all that came in the set. Everything to get you started.
customer_reviews.author: baseboard16

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. I would buy his again and had friends buy it for themselves
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Chagnon

customer_reviews.title: ... a cork tip on these at all a little disappointed in that
customer_reviews.text: Not a cork tip on these at all a little disappointed in that. But the price made up for it.
customer_reviews.author: The Beard

customer_reviews.title: Great house warming gift for a friend who bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great house warming gift for a friend who bought a home with a pool table that didn't have any usable equipment
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Good value accessories
customer_reviews.text: Good value accessories. Cues are straight, balls are solid. Rack is a little large, so there's some 'wobble' when racking up, but all in all, good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Tabbo

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, everything was in great shape at arrival and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: UGAfan

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, although the tips of the cue stick are easy to fall off, I still am satisfied with this product. Also the price is great!!! Should I decide to purchase another set, this would be the set to get, especially for billard rookies like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: and repair kit are nice. The bridge is utter
customer_reviews.text: The cue sticks are a decent basic set. The balls, brushes, racks, and repair kit are nice. The bridge is utter garbage
customer_reviews.author: Troy Beneke

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today, everything is here and seems to be decent quality... For the money I don't think you could beat it honestly. The sticks seem to be of good quality as well. Would recommend to my peers.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Professional
customer_reviews.text: This kit is not for the amateur. It has everything you could imagine you would need to shoot pool and things you don't know you need. Like a box of mixed chocolates It needs a explanation of all the pieces inside. Great quality. Great buy. It's still a winner
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Sticks are on the lighter side, 19oz. One tip was chipped when received but it came with replacements. Everything else was perfect condition and very nice. We would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: The kit was great! It came with everything that we needed for our first pool table. The Kit had the right size pool cues and came complete with all necessary accessories to enjoy playing a great game of pool. Great price for everything that came with Kit. I would recommend this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: JTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Pool accessories
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent buy. It's really a well thought out starter kit. The only thing not in the kit is the pool table and the wall to hang the cues. Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Purpora

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price! Would like to have had instructions for the games that are included
customer_reviews.author: Chris Glessner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set... I was really surprised the great quality for such a small price. I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pool sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product was supposed to come with four cue sticks and I only received one. Very disappointed already, haven’t used the products yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a second hand table off of Craigslist and needed pretty much every accessory to go with it. I purchased this package and it far exceeded my expectations considering its price. Would highly recommend to other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing accessory kit
customer_reviews.text: Amazing accessory kit, has everything you need and more for your pool table. The pool cues are extremely high quality for the price of the kit.
customer_reviews.author: B Amos

customer_reviews.title: Nice complete set
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic replacement set for the casual billiard player. Has everything you need for 8-ball / 9-ball and game play.
customer_reviews.author: Judith & Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Replacement set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace some older billiard balls I had. The cue's were great, didn't need another 9-ball rack but it is handy to have just in case. Overall, extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D. Knoblock

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good starter kit for someone just learning
customer_reviews.text: The balls are a very low grade ball, as are the sticks.Probably a good starter kit for someone just learning, but if you want something nicer, pay the extra money for a better set.
customer_reviews.author: candk

customer_reviews.title: Good buy so far
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice now and everything seems really good. Sticks are nice, though everything is made in China. Balls are pro like, so I can't complain
customer_reviews.author: ArrowInTheKnee2!

customer_reviews.title: You wont find a better deal
customer_reviews.text: Not a better deal for the dollar. I have an outdoor table and this has everything I need with pretty good quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hunter

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 0 stars if they would let me. I ordered this product expecting to get what you pay for ... meaning I didn't expect to get premier products for this price point. But every pool cue was significantly warped. I ordered a replacement kit and guess what ... all pool cues in the replacement kit were warped. You can't play football with a flat football (except Tom Brady) and you can't play pool, at least not very good pool, with warped sticks. This is unacceptable by the manufacture. Both the manufacture and Amazon should be ashamed for peddling this sh-t pool kit. DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: John Murkin

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars for price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Had one where the tip was missing. Came with a repair kit so I will use it to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Such a Bargain
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used pool table that had no equipment. This set covered all of my needs at a great price. For the level of play at my house, I don't need anything fancy. You cannot beat this value.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clare

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, complete set. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything you could need, except a shortie stick, which we bought separately. It's high quality and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Luce

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My cue rack only came with one piece. All that money and I can’t hang the pool sticks.
customer_reviews.author: ashlee Babst

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price, and a well rounded set for the casual pool player. Gave it to my father for Christmas to help him finish off the pool room and he has been very satisfied with the set.
customer_reviews.author: boxcarbilly

customer_reviews.title: Soccer Mom
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for any Game Room with lot's of teenagers or Man Caves!! Great quality for the money. Quick delivery and the packaging was perfect. Thanks for caring about your customer by making the set affordable for our family.
customer_reviews.author: O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this set for our youth group, seems pretty good. We have owned it for 6 months now, and only broke one stick, (A student smashed it over a metal trash can.) sticks are durable, ball set is really nice, and has all accessories needed to play. All cues were straight, but the finish scratches easy on the black cues.
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Missing brush
customer_reviews.text: Just had it delivered and the under the table brush is missing. The box was sealed so I'm guessing it's a manufacturing issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging and loads of stuff. The pool racks are very nice wood and so are the pool cue holders
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The set seems like a good value overall but I noticed that the 4 ball is significantly smaller than the others. Not sure if it's a factory defect or if they put the wrong ball in the box but I gues everything else is ok. The problem with the 4 ball being smaller is that you can never get a tight rack.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Could be better!!
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's an ok purchase. 2 of the 4 sticks are pretty warped. You get what you pay for, I guess?
customer_reviews.author: T.Boyle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only received half the items that were to be included!! Was given no explanation!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Everything was as described. Good balls and sticks.
customer_reviews.author: cncworker

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly packaged.  Fantastic stock set.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says it is. Great price! I often have a house full of teens. I love that they can play but I dont have to flip out because theyre playing with prize possessions.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

product_meta.title: Pool Table Accessory 32 Piece Kit- Billiards Balls, Cues, Stick Repair, Roman Rack, Table Brush, Table Cover, Tally Bottle by Trademark Gameroom
product_meta.description:
Enjoy the excitement of a competitive billiards game without the pool halls or bars with this Pool Table Accessory Set 32 Piece by Trademark Gameroom. This all-in-one set conveniently gives you everything you need to rack up the fun for this classic game, perfect for players of all ages and skill levels. Every piece in this attractive set is constructed with sturdy materials to provide hours of entertainment, without sacrificing quality for the ultimate addition to any game room! SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Trademark Games is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous Quality Control process. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Trademark Gameroom and ONLY Pool Table Accessory Set 32 Piece by Trademark Gameroom are GUARANTEED to be genuine. IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products.

AMAZON.COM
Outfit your pool table with this 32-piece set of billiard accessories. Included are a set of Pro Series Royal Crown billiard balls; four cue sticks; a bridge stick; a nine-ball diamond; a triangle; a six-cue Roman rack; an under rail brush; a 9-inch table brush; a plastic tally bottle; a box of blue chalk; two rubber chalk holders; a tip repair kit; and a clear, 8-foot table cover. The balls are regulation size at 2 1/4 inches in diameter, and the cue sticks measure 57.5 inches each.
feature_bullets: HOURS OF FUN–  This complete kit includes everything needed for billiards games like 8-ball, nine-ball, Bottle Billiards, one-pocket and more! Four fashionable pool sticks are crafted with care providing balance and weight for a perfect shot every time.

ALL INCLUDED– This set has everything needed for table maintenance, including an 8” under-rail brush, 9” table brush, and a 109” x 66”universal cover to keep table felt clean. Also, the chalk and handy tip repair kit help to enhance cue performance!

DURABLE MATERIALS– This set is made of quality materials that can withstand everyday use, fantastic for billiards players of all levels. This set is great for both kids and adults from beginner to proficient, or to host your own at home pool tournament.

REGULATION SIZE- The Pro Series Royal Crown Billiard Ball set included are 2.25” in diameter and treated to resist fading, chipping, and cracking. The regulation 57.5” long cue sticks weigh 21 oz. each, and are polished for a unique and elegant finish.

PRODUCT DETAILS– Billiard balls. Table brush. Under rail brush. Standard triangle rack and diamond rack. 2-Piece Roman Rack. Tally bottle and balls. 6 cue chalks. Tip repair kit in case. Chalk holders. Cue sticks. Bridge stick. Bridge head. Table cover
